mng: to invade, to plunder, bandit, foe, enemy

exm.mng: minister of criminal justice (official rank in imperial China)
Kou Zhun (961-1023), Northern Song politician and poet
used erroneously for 豆蔻年華|豆蔻年华, a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood, a budding beauty
see 成則為王，敗則為寇|成则为王，败则为寇[cheng2 ze2 wei2 wang2 , bai4 ze2 wei2 kou4]
exm.pyn: chéng zhě wéi wáng , bài zhě wéi kòu
